tag_list: digital-agency-london, graphic-design, web-design, web-design-london, social-media, facebook, twitter
overview:
Jonathan is the social media manager for JBi Web Design, a digital agency based in London.

He is always looking for fresh and relevant content to share on Facebook, Twitter, and Google+, and practical ways to increase the fans and follower count.

He also moderates the JBi blog and often uploads his own bespoke articles of helpful tips on social media and web design that are well worth a look!

With a background in graphic design, Jonathan understands design ethics, and when heâ€™s not browsing the latest pages of Mashable, or customising the JBi fan page, you can find him designing websites for new clients or doing a bit of project management.
